mapper.update: create table ${siteId}_type_hit ( categoryId varchar(64), timeId varchar(11), typeId varchar(32), dtype varchar(32), hit int, primary key (categoryId, timeId, dtype) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
mapper.select: select categoryId, timeId, typeId, dtype, hit from ${siteId}_type_hit limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into ${siteId}_type_hit (categoryId, timeId, typeId, dtype, hit) values (#{categoryId}, #{timeId}, #{typeId}, #{dtype}, #{hit})
